Class Surface

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    convexPoligon, disc, Plain, Rectangle, sphere, Triangle

    public abstract class Surface
extends java.lang.Object
implements IInitable
    Represent a point light Add methods as you wish, this can be a super class for other lights (think which)
